subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Coaches and Managers
Assaults
lead_paragraph: Bob Knight and John Calipari may not see eye to eye on the integrity of college basketball, but both became wealthy men utilizing the N.C.A.A.’s exploitative, plantationlike system.
